en_us: A crafting recipe pack that adds some nifty new recipes to the game.
The custom crafter can be used to perform some simple crafting operations.\n\nThe following recipes have been added.
Stairs can be reverted to their base block
Slabs can be reverted to their base block
Any sandstone can be converted into sand
Any red sandstone can be converted into red sand
Any wool can be ripped into string
Diamond, iron, copper, and golden armor can be crafted
